page.title: 12SUPERNATURAL 3
page.content: {THE VIKING SHIP} One dark night,about{one hundred years ago,a strange ship-like shape was seen rowing across the misty moonlit sky. When the mist cleared,they saw a {Viking ship}moving effortlessly high abovethe{moorland}towards{Leech Pool.} It landed on the water and burst into flames.The burning ship's mast broke off and fell into the water and suddenly at{twelve-midnight}it stopped {burning}and sank into the pool. Today on certain nights,when there's a{full moon,}the Viking ship may be seen to rise from the water through the mist and burn.It is said that as it burns figures can be seen frantically running around on board and screams are heard in the quietness of the night.Just after midnight the flames stop flickering and the ship sinks back into{Leech Pool. }
